options.heading: Scotland’s first university
options.paragraph: Discover what it’s like to study at St Andrews. Search undergraduate courses, explore postgraduate opportunities or find flexible study options.

options.heading: Visit the University
options.paragraph: Join us on a visiting day to meet with academic staff, talk to current students, see the town and ask any questions you have about applying. Book your visit today.

options.heading: Accommodation at St Andrews
options.paragraph: St Andrews has more than 4,000 bed spaces and a fantastic variety of accommodation to suit all tastes and budgets. Prospective students can be sure that they will find suitable accommodation during their studies.
